name: Primo Geovishap
desc:
After many years, the awesomely powerful Primo Geovishaps grow accustomed to changes in their elemental environment.
Folktales hold that after the great "draconic calamity" that led to the ruination of Tianqiu Valley, the overlord of the Geovishaps and Primo Geovishaps was imprisoned deep beneath the earth, and so too did they burrow into deep and unseen places, awaiting their chance to rise once more...

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Juvenile Jade
dropMaterial.desc:
A crystalline substance taken from a Primo Geovishap. Within it is contained the potential to become a dragon.
These dull crystals are precipitated within the bodies of vishaps sleeping in the mountains. Liyue folklore holds that they will gather power over many years, after which this crystal will, at last, replace their original heart, and the vishap will become a true dragon — one that can shake the mountains and split the earth.

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

customize.text: A Primo Geovishap awoken from a centuries-long slumber that can absorb different kinds of elemental power to unleash a Primordial Shower infused with Hydro, Pyro, Cryo, or Electro. If this attack hits a character protected by a <color=#ffe14b>shield</color> , the Primo Geovishap will take some DMG in return. If <color=#ffe14b>the shield's elemental type is Geo</color> or it <color=#ffe14b>matches that of the Primordial Shower</color> , the amount of reflected DMG will be increased...

<color=#ffd780>Deflection!</color>
Use a shield to counter a Primo Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>You Can Have Those Back!</color>
Use a shield of a matching type (or a Geo shield) to counter a Geovishap's Primordial Shower attack and deal immense DMG.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Fine, I'll Do It Myself</color>
Defeat a Primo Geovishap without reflecting its Primordial Shower.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Geo Elemental Reaction?</color>
Defeat the Primo Geovishap in all of its elemental forms.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Moving Mountains</color>
Defeat a Primo Geovishap in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
